full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I KHRID YIG MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA BKA' GDAMS SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I KHRID YIG MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA BKA' GDAMS SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN PA PHYUG PO NOR RU SRID MTHAR KYIS RGYANGS RING PO NAS BSKUL ZHING, CHOS TSUL 'DI LA NYAMS LEN SNYING POR MDZAD PA BZHED PA MANG POR YANG PHAN DU RE BA'I BSAM PAS DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN @015B GYIS, ,BAL BOD MTSAMS KYI DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
